# Body

**Associated Type**

A view that represents the appearance and interaction of a form.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : View
```

## Creating custom form styles

- **makeBody(configuration:)**: Creates a view that represents the body of a form.
- **FormStyle.Configuration**: The properties of a form instance.

items.description: Creates a view that represents the body of a form.
